text: te brasenbae puokke min ach chhlaeyotb champoh anak ban te noh chaur anakdoeng tha tampit puokke kreante thveuteamchamnng chetd robsa puokke bonnaoh . haey kmean anaknea del v nge v ng cheang anak del thveuteam chamnngchetd robsa ke daoy kmean kar changaoulobangheanh pi a l laoh noh laey . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh min changaoulobangheanh champoh krom del bampean laey
